title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.45 - Diplomas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 3.45 - Diplomas

State Regulations

No high school diploma shall be conferred which does not
represent four years or their equivalent in grades above grade eight, and no
such diploma shall be conferred upon a pupil who has not achieved a passing
rating in each of the basic competency tests established by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
3.45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
